name: go-to-bed
question: When did you go to bed?

name: caffeine
question: How many units of caffeine did you have (a unit is 8 oz of coffee or tea, 20 oz of caffeinated soda)?

name: alcohol
question: How many units of alcohol did you have (a unit is 12 oz of beer, 5 oz of wine, 1.5 oz of liquor)?

name: exercise-strength
question: How many minutes of strength training did you do, such as lifting weights or doing push ups?

name: exercise-aerobic
question: How many minutes of aerobic exercise did you do, such as jogging or cycling?

name: walking
question: How many minutes of walking did you do?

name: work
question: How many hours of work did you do, including professional and personal work?
